text: Abigail Haight Huntsman (born May 1, 1986) is an American television personality. She was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. She is currently a co-host of ABC's The View. Huntsman was a reporter for Fox News Channel and co-host of Fox & Friends. She was a host on MSNBC. She is a daughter of former Utah Governor Jon Huntsman Jr.. ==References== ==Other websites== *Fox News profile Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:American television personalities Category:American television news anchors Category:American political commentators Category:Fox News people Category:American LGBT rights activists Category:People from Philadelphia Category:People from Salt Lake City, Utah
title: Abby Huntsman
